title: Create test fixtures and mock data tool
description:
Export sample ad data from BigQuery as JSON fixtures AND create mock data tool for AI-first validation.

## AI-First Priority
This is now CRITICAL PATH - agents are validated with mock data BEFORE building data connectors.

## Fixtures to create
- TL account sample (high-performing ads)
- TL TikTok waste example ($88k, 0 ROAS)
- WH account sample
- WH Floor Lamps waste example (₹55k, 0 ROAS)

## Location
tests/fixtures/
├── tl_sample_ads.json
├── wh_sample_ads.json
└── edge_cases.json

## Mock Data Tool (P1-2)
```python
from google.adk.tools import FunctionTool
import json

async def get_ad_data_mock(account_id: str, days: int = 30) -> Dict:
    """Return fixture data for AI validation."""
    fixture_path = f"tests/fixtures/{account_id}_sample_ads.json"
    with open(fixture_path) as f:
        return json.load(f)

get_ad_data_tool = FunctionTool(func=get_ad_data_mock)
```

## Use in tests
```python
@pytest.fixture
def sample_ad_data():
    with open("tests/fixtures/tl_sample_ads.json") as f:
        return json.load(f)
```
